seo.pageDescription: Get unrivaled access to Web3 along with top-tier custody integrations

node.headline:
Interact with over 17,000
DeFi protocols and
applications

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask serves over 30M monthly active users and is connected to almost every DeFi dapp. Trade, invest, stake, lend, borrow, provide liquidity, and bridge assets across EVM chains.

node.eyebrow: UNRIVALED CONNECTIVITY TO ALL OF WEB3

childMarkdownRemark.html:
All of MetaMask
Use MMI to gain access to all of Web3
Multi-chain Access
Bridge assets and trade across EVM chains and L2s
Custody Options
Work with one of our top-tier custodian partners to manage key storage, facilitate multi-signature transaction approvals, and optimize trade flows
Advanced DeFi Compliance
Run risk assessment on wallet and smart contract addresses or DeFi pools
Holistic monitoring
Get a consolidated view of all assets across 13 EVM chains on the Portfolio Dashboard
Detailed transaction reporting
View your transaction history, get snapshots of weekly, monthly and quarterly valuations, provide read-only access and CSV downloads to your treasury portfolio valuation, and input reference notes for each transaction

node.headline: Work with a custodian that matches your needs

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask Institutional is partnered with eleven top-tier qualified custodians and custody providers. Together, our partners provide global coverage and diverse tech stack offerings to meet all variations of institutional-grade custody requirements.

With MMI’s custodian account architecture, accounts are not locked to only one EVM network. Once your custodian offers support for multiple chains, your fund will be able to bridge assets and execute trades across Ethereum based sidechains and L2s. Welcome to new frontiers in institutional DeFi investments.

node.headline: Access DeFi with the blue fox
